opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: National Union Fire Insurance Company of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania v. Textron Financial Corp

opinion:
538 U.S. 974

NATIONAL UNION FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY OF PITTSBURGH, PENNSYLVANIA
v.
TEXTRON FINANCIAL CORP.

No. 02-966.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 21, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEALS OF CALIFORNIA FOR THE FOURTH APPELLATE DISTRICT.

2

Ct. App. Cal., 4th App. Dist. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of State Farm Mut. Automobile Ins. Co. v. Campbell, ante, p. 408.
